title: High Debt Service Burden
description: In 2023, El Salvador's total debt service reached 82.98% of its exports of goods, services, and primary income, and 28.83% of its Gross National Income (GNI), indicating a significant financial burden.

title: Challenging Business Entry Environment
description: In 2024, El Salvador scored 62.23 in the Business Entry Pillar for Quality of Regulations, suggesting room for improvement in facilitating new business ventures.

title: Efficient Credit Information Accessibility
description: El Salvador achieved a score of 85.28 in 2024 for the Accessibility of Information in Credit Infrastructure, reflecting a robust system for credit information.

title: Inefficient Judicial Insolvency Proceedings
description: With a score of 14.25 in 2024, El Salvador's operational efficiency in resolving judicial insolvency proceedings is notably low, indicating a need for reform.
